SubscriptionId.description: Azure Subscription Id that will be used to host aspire app

ResourceGroup.description: Azure Resource Group name where to create resources

ResourceGroupPrefix.description: Azure Resource Group prefix used in resource groups names created

AllowResourceGroupCreation.description: Flag that shows if it is allowed to create a resource group if not exists

Location.description: Azure Location that will be used to create resources

CredentialSource.description: Shows where to look for Azure credentials
